item.title: CLF
item.description: score:-102 Chances: Cleveland-Cliffs Inc. (CLF) shares have started gaining and might continue moving higher in the near term, as indicated by solid earnings estimate revisions. item.title: M
item.description: score:100 Chances: Macy’s rejected a $5.8 billion buyout offer and is being pressured to sell its prime Herald Square location, indicating potential for increased shareholder value through strategic decisions. Private-equity firm Sycamore Partners is considering a potential bid to purchase Macy’s, suggesting the possibility of a new takeover offer and potential for stock price increase.

item.title: CRWD
item.description: score:172 Chances: CrowdStrike (CRWD) has received quite a bit of attention from Zacks.com users lately. Shares of cybersecurity company CrowdStrike (NASDAQ:CRWD) jumped 5.4% in the afternoon session after Morgan Stanley analyst Hamza Fodderwala upgraded the stock’s rating from Equal-Weight (Hold) to Overweight (Buy) and raised the price target from $203 to $304.

item.title: U
